file.name: openapi-3.0.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Link Example
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /local:
    get:
      operationId: localReference
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Local reference
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Local'
  /local-file-reference:
    get:
      operationId: localFileReference
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Local file reference
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'petstore.yaml#/components/schemas/Pet'
  /remote-reference:
    get:
      operationId: remoteReference
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Remote reference
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/swagger.json#/definitions/Pet'
components:
  schemas:
    Local:
      type: string
